summary.para: Mark a test or test fixture as requiring that particular platform support has been installed into Unity.
The list of platforms required by the test or test fixture marked with this attribute.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.TestTools.RequirePlatformSupportAttribute.#ctor(UnityEditor.BuildTarget[])

summary.para: Specifies that the test or test fixture requires particular platform support to be installed. See RequirePlatformSupportAttribute.

member.param: The list of platforms required by this test or test fixture.
